structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Rate on business inventories levied by a city or urban-county government -- Exception.

text.section: Subject to the provisions of KRS 132.027, a city or urban-county government may levy a rate on business inventories equal to or less than the prevailing rate of taxation on other tangible personal property in the respective city or urban-county government.

The tangible personal property tax shall not be levied upon:
The inventories of licensed motor vehicle dealers, including licensed motor vehicle auction dealers; or
Motor vehicles that are in the possession of a licensed motor vehicle dealer, including licensed motor vehicle auction dealers, for sale, although ownership has not been transferred to the dealer.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 94, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 319, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1980.
